markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You play a pounding rhythm on the drum. If the next action you use is to cast a [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=31) cantrip that has an emanation, increase the area of the emanation by 30 feet.
name: Interact (concentrate)
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 72
